creator: tsfu@hkucs.org
text:
2.0.39 could be compiled by cygwin on both Windows XP sp1 and Windows .Net RC1 
but it's not stable at all once invoked. For each and every file download, I 
need to restart or stop/start it for my friends to continue to download the 
next file or it gets hung with a lot of child spawned with no response at all.


Jason

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
You are a little behind the times at 2.0.39.  Please try upgrading
both your apache and your cygwin.

(In general, the cygwin version of apache is not nearly as well tested
as either the unix or native-windows versions.  But reports are welcome,
but please test against the latest version and give us as much specific
detail as possible.)

Thanks for using Apache.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text: no further response. Assuming it fixed with newer versions.
